lead_paragraph: With the All-Star Game coming up next week, Drew Pomeranz made a strong case to pitch in his home ballpark.

headline.print_headline: Pomeranz Makes All-Star Case in Padres' 6-0 Win Over Dodgers
headline.main: Pomeranz Makes All-Star Case in Padres' 6-0 Win Over Dodgers
